# CiWorkflowUpdateRequest.Data

**Object**

The data element of the request you use to update an Xcode Cloud workflow.

## Declaration

```swift
object CiWorkflowUpdateRequest.Data
```

## Objects

- **CiWorkflowUpdateRequest.Data.Attributes**: The attributes of the Workflows resource you’re changing with the update request.
- **CiWorkflowUpdateRequest.Data.Relationships**: The relationships to other resources that you can set with this request.
